external-chat.chat-disable-description: Chat is disabled for this app. Ask the app owner to enable chat in Access settings.
external-chat.chat-password-protected-description: Chat is password protected. Enter the password to access the chat.

landing.case-studies-1-description: We will provide customized web pages and applications for each city, ward, town, and village in Japan, with the aim of improving the efficiency of support for local foreign residents and achieving two-way communication between local governments and residents.
landing.faq1-ans: One Vector uses an information retrieval technique called RAG along with other optimizations in its answering process. Combined with Large Language Models, we can achieve best of both worlds, natural language communication and accurate answers.
landing.faq1-ques: How is One Vector different from existing AI chatbot services?
landing.faq2-ans: Yes, every steps in the process, data is handled with privacy in mind. You also have full control of the data all the time. Even when using an LLM in the process, your data is not used for training.
landing.faq2-ques: Are my documents and information secure?
landing.features-description: “Answering customer questions takes time and effort. While AI can help, it sometimes generates incorrect responses. What if there was a system that could provide accurate answers directly from your company’s documents, while responding naturally?”
landing.features-item1-description: We use the latest information retrieval technique called RAG so no information is made up by AI.
landing.features-item1-title: Answers are coming from your documents and resources
landing.features-item2-description: You control what knowledge is kept in the system and your data is not used for AI training
landing.features-item3-description: You can set alerts to review and update time sensitive information in the knowledge base
landing.home-description: With cutting-edge information retrieval techniques and AI that understands your content, we provide accurate answers to customers’ questions and reduce hours of manual replies.
landing.implementation-card1-description: You can also use our service as an internal knowledge base for your organization. Employees can use a chat interface to search and confirm information. Administrators from your organization can manage and keep the information up to date using the admin dashboard.
landing.implementation-card1-title: Using as an internal knowledge base
landing.implementation-card2-description: You can use our services like a chatbot on your existing website without integration. We can provide you with a chat interface to embed on your website. You can use the knowledge dashboard to manage your knowledge.
landing.implementation-card2-title: If you want a chat interface on your website
landing.implementation-card3-description1: You can integrate our services into your existing system using APIs. You can manage the knowledge base using our knowledge dashboard. Our engineers can also help you integrate our services in your system. Please
landing.implementation-card3-title: If your system already have a chat interface
landing.implementation-contact-sale-description: If you are interested or if your organization has specific requirements, please send us a message.
